pageContext.claim: “A design of our Steel Slat Barrier which is totally effective while at the same time beautiful!”
pageContext.analysis: Our colleague Philip Bump did the math on the image attached to this tweet to determine if the steel slats would be "totally effective." Based on the rendering, there would be a gap of 9.8 inches between each of the slats. Given that people have shimmied through spaces half that size, it likely wouldn't stop people who wanted to squeeze through. Of course, it's possible that Trump's image is just a rough design, but that's not what the president indicated.
